channel.title: CVE Feed for Brocade -- Fabric OS
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Brocade -- Fabric OS

item.title: CVE-2023-3454|2024-06-20T15:00:34.252Z -- brocade -- fabric%20os
item.description: Remote code execution (RCE) vulnerability in Brocade Fabric OS after v9.0 and before v9.2.0 could allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code and use this to gain root access to the Brocade switch.

item.title: CVE-2023-3454|2024-04-04T17:03:54.171Z -- brocade -- fabric%20os
item.description: Remote code execution (RCE) vulnerability in Brocade Fabric OS after v9.0 and before v9.2.0 could allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code and use this to gain root access to the Brocade switch.

item.title: CVE-2023-5973|2024-06-04T17:28:45.659Z -- brocade -- fabric%20os
item.description: Brocade Web Interface in Brocade Fabric OS v9.x and before v9.2.0 does not properly represent the portName to the user if the portName contains reserved characters. This could allow an authenticated user to alter the UI of the Brocade Switch and change ports display.
